question: Which of the following is the quality of the pitch of the voice of women?
option1: marginally lower than that of men
option3: much lower than that of men
option4: the same as that of men
explanation: The larger the larynx, the longer and thicker the vocal folds and the lower the pitch of the voice. Typical male voices range in pitch from 85 hertz to 180 hertz. Typical female voices range from 165 hertz to 255 hertz.
